header.title: Past Conferences
header.description: Explore the legacy of IC-SIT. Our previous conferences have been pivotal in fostering global collaboration and showcasing groundbreaking research in intelligent computing and sustainable technologies.

conferences.year: This is the first edition of IC-SAGAR, so there are no past conferences to display. Stay tuned for updates on future editions!
conferences.title: 1st International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Sustainable Innovations in Technology (IC-SAGAR 2026)
conferences.location: Ajay Binay Institute of Technology, Cuttack, Odisha, India
conferences.description: The inaugural edition of IC-SAGAR witnessed a gathering of brilliant minds from academia and industry. Key themes included AI, IoT, and Green Computing. The conference featured 4 keynote sessions and over 60 technical paper presentations.
